Author: weenieHJ
Text: I relate 100% to this, the first time I started restricting and purging I had a BMI in the high 20’s always hated the compliments because people where noticing my body but also loved the validation. After recovering to a healthy weight and relapsing again i feel the same like???? (Wishing you all the best though  ❤️)

Author: kimooni
Text: I heavily relate to this. it’s almost bittersweet, even. If no one compliments my weight loss—*great!* I hate bringing up my weight so temporarily I’m not uncomfortable... *but did they notice? I must be just as fat as when they last saw me.* and so on.   on the other hand, if they ask how I lost weight I don’t know what to tell them. i can’t say im skipping meals and barely eating lmfao
